mapper.select: SELECT worksheet_no, work_dt, worker_id, position_cd, user_type, going_time, quitting_time FROM WORKSHEET WHERE work_dt IN(trunc(sysdate,'d'), trunc(sysdate,'d')+1, trunc(sysdate,'d')+2, trunc(sysdate,'d')+3, trunc(sysdate,'d')+4, trunc(sysdate,'d')+5, trunc(sysdate,'d')+6)
SELECT work_dt FROM worksheet WHERE work_dt >= TO_DATE(#{firstDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND work_dt < TO_DATE(#{lastDate},'YYYY-MM-DD')+1
mapper.update: UPDATE worksheet SET worker_Id = #{workerId}, color = #{color}, textColor = #{textColor}, backgroundColor = #{backgroundColor} where going_time = TO_DATE(#{goingTime},'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi') and quitting_time = TO_DATE(#{quittingTime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi')
mapper.insert: insert into worksheet(worksheet_no, work_dt, worker_id, position_cd, user_type, going_time, quitting_time) values(SEQ_WORKSHEET.nextval, to_date(#{realDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), #{workerId}, #{positionCd}, #{userType}, #{goingTime}, #{quittingTime})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM WORKSHEET ORDER BY GOING_TIME
